css: .logo img{height:60px;width:auto}.p1 h2::after,.p3 h2::after,.p6 h2::after,.p7 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;height:6px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.mb-40{margin-bottom:40px}.p5 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.p4 h4,.p5 h4{margin-bottom:30px;margin-top:5px;font-size:1em}footer.footer{background-color:#000;color:#fff!important;margin-top:40px}footer a{text-decoration:none!important;color:#fff!important}li{list-style:none;padding:0!important;margin:0!important}footer hr{color:#fff}.list-menu-footer p{margin-bottom:.2rem}.list-menu-footer a{display: block; margin-bottom: 10px}
